name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D BIRTHDAY LIVE】 Through the Curious Tune - Anya Melfissa 2025 Birthday Live 生誕祭ライブ #CuriousTune3D [FXLKbTnMP2M]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of the song 'Supernova' by Anya Melfissa, Kureiji Ollie, and Pavolia Reine.
Performance of the song 'Together Forever!' (ずうっといっしょ！) by Anya Melfissa and Tokoyami Towa.
scenes.song_name: Together Forever! (ずうっといっしょ！)

subtitles.original: …だろ
subtitles.english: ...right?

subtitles.original: でもどうしても引き剥がして
subtitles.english: But I must tear it away

subtitles.original: その深い深い瞳に別の色を乗せたい
subtitles.english: I want to put a different color in those deep, deep eyes

subtitles.original: 置いてきた空振りを今蹴り飛ばして
subtitles.english: Kicking away the swings and misses I left behind

subtitles.original: 駆けつけるから
subtitles.english: Because I'm coming for you

subtitles.original: 甘く淫らに見せるから
subtitles.english: Because I'll show you something sweet and lewd

subtitles.original: バイバイしても元通りでもない
subtitles.english: Even if we say goodbye, it won't be like it was

subtitles.original: 私に成せることはないが
subtitles.english: There's nothing I can do, but...

subtitles.original: でもそうだきっと今更と言って
subtitles.english: But that's right, surely you'll say it's too late

subtitles.original: 仰ぐ
subtitles.english: Looking up

subtitles.original: 頷き広がる空から
subtitles.english: From the nodding, spreading sky

subtitles.original: 愛していたい　うっかりしなきゃ始まらない
subtitles.english: I want to love; it won't start unless I'm careless

subtitles.original: いびつなステップでも今は君と踊っていたい
subtitles.english: Even with distorted steps, I want to dance with you now

subtitles.original: ただ生きるためのまじないをそこに残した
subtitles.english: I left a spell there just for living

subtitles.original: 命を追って欲しい君と短くない季節渡って
subtitles.english: I want you to chase life, crossing seasons with you that aren't short

subtitles.original: バイバイしても元通りでもない
subtitles.english: Even if we say goodbye, it won't be like it was

subtitles.original: 私にできることはあるか
subtitles.english: Is there anything I can do?

subtitles.original: このテンポそうだこんな歌ならどうだ
subtitles.english: This tempo, yes, how about a song like this?

subtitles.original: だらしなくないけどちょっといいかもね
subtitles.english: It's not slovenly, but it might be a bit good

subtitles.original: もっと響かせて
subtitles.english: Make it resonate more

subtitles.original: この道に駆けて
subtitles.english: Running on this path

subtitles.original: ずうっといっしょ！
subtitles.english: Together Forever!

subtitles.original: 10年越しても窓の外のせいで手摺り減った
subtitles.english: Even after 10 years, the handrail wore down because of the outside window

subtitles.original: 10年見逃して窓の外見せる変えるなくなった
subtitles.english: Overlooking it for 10 years, there's no more showing or changing the outside window

subtitles.original: 繋ごうよ手と手を背中も引き込んで
subtitles.english: Let's join hands, drawing our backs in too

subtitles.original: お互いに足を引っ張ったお互いに充電した想い出がずうっといっしょ
subtitles.english: Pulling each other's legs, recharging each other, memories are always together

subtitles.original: 3回目の夏誰からも見られていない気がしたんだ
subtitles.english: The third summer, I felt like no one was watching me

subtitles.original: 千々に砕けて昼の街期待しないようにしたんだ
subtitles.english: Shattered into pieces, I tried not to expect anything from the city during the day

subtitles.original: そうやってもう白黒のストイベ自棄になった
subtitles.english: Doing that, the black and white event made me desperate

subtitles.original: あたし面死にたくて仕方ないこんな顔台無しにしたいと思えないもん
subtitles.english: I can't help wanting to die, I can't imagine wanting to ruin this face

subtitles.original: 供に過ごした日々が
subtitles.english: The days we spent together

subtitles.original: 鮮やかな幸せが代えの利かないドラマになってたらいいな
subtitles.english: I hope the vivid happiness becomes an irreplaceable drama

subtitles.original: 離れ離れなんて誰かが継ぎ接いだバグだよね
subtitles.english: Being apart is just a bug someone patched together, right?

subtitles.original: あなたの一生の後悔として添い遂げるよ
subtitles.english: I'll live out my life as your lifelong regret

subtitles.original: 大切なものってなに？今失くしたそれ
subtitles.english: What is the most precious thing? The thing you just lost

subtitles.original: あたしと間違いを犯したな取り返しがつかないです
subtitles.english: You made a mistake with me; it's irreversible

subtitles.original: 恋焦がれる時も止める時も腐れ縁の中でずうっといっしょ
subtitles.english: When longing, when stopping, in this inseparable bond, always together

subtitles.original: もうちょっと普通に悲しいこと悲しいと思いたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to feel sad things as sad, just a bit more normally

subtitles.original: 叙情の端に感情隠して楽になりたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to hide my emotions at the edge of lyricism and be at ease

subtitles.original: 精一杯懸命に生きてくださいね
subtitles.english: Please live your life as hard as you can

subtitles.original: あたし面死にたくて仕方ないあの子の言いなりになんていたくないの
subtitles.english: I can't help wanting to die, I don't want to be at that girl's beck and call

subtitles.original: あなただけひとりで
subtitles.english: Just you alone

subtitles.original: あたしの目を盗んで幸せになろうなんて思わないで
subtitles.english: Don't think about becoming happy behind my back

subtitles.original: 髪を乾かしてくれた夜から
subtitles.english: Since the night you dried my hair

subtitles.original: あたしは壊されてんだよ
subtitles.english: I've been broken

subtitles.original: あなたの一生の後悔として添い遂げるよ
subtitles.english: I'll live out my life as your lifelong regret

subtitles.original: 外れなくなってしまった指輪みたいに
subtitles.english: Like a ring that won't come off

subtitles.original: 今もずっと欲しがっている最低でいてよ
subtitles.english: I'm still wanting it; please be the worst

subtitles.original: 一緒にいた時の方が私可愛かったな
subtitles.english: I was cuter when we were together

subtitles.original: あなたの一生の後悔として添い遂げるよ
subtitles.english: I'll live out my life as your lifelong regret

subtitles.original: 大切なものってなに？胸打したそれ
subtitles.english: What is the most precious thing? That which struck your heart

subtitles.original: あたしと間違いを犯したな取り返しがつかないです
subtitles.english: You made a mistake with me; it's irreversible

subtitles.original: 恋焦がれる時も止める時もどん底で眠っていても遅くないわ　墓までずうっといっしょ
subtitles.english: When longing, when stopping, even if sleeping at rock bottom, it's not too late. All the way to the grave, always together
